raw_text: Using what is known as the ONE VS ALL classification strategy, n binary classifiers are trained, where n is number of semantic classes including a NULL class. raw_text: The classifiers in the identification step are trained with the standard L2-lossSVM formulation, while the classifiers in the labelling step are trained using the method of Cram mer and Singer.In order to reduce the number of candidate arguments in the identification step, I apply the filtering technique of Xue and Palmer (2004), trivially adopted to the dependency syntax formalism
